channel.title: My 3 (or more) Problems
channel.description:
I've been working on making my server, and i have a few problems, plz help if u can. :)
[center] [size=15pt][u][b]Useful Stuff[/b][/u][/center] [center]i'm using p16 with jdk 6.0[/center] [center]my server compiles/runs correctly[/center]
ok:
[b]question 1[/b] What are cases, and where and how do i add them? how do they work?
[b]Question 2[/b] [s]How can i make something happen when i click on an object?[/s] :confused: WHERE DO I ADD THIS CODE? :confused: can i do item on item? item on object? item on npc?
[b]Question 3[/b] How do i add monster drops? do i use item3.java or npcdrops.cgf? or something else?
[b]Question 4[/b] What does my worldobjects.cfg file do? does it replace fedexer's tut? or do i have to add that too?
[center][shadow=red,left][size=25pt][font=Verdana]THANKS 4 HELPING![/font][/size][/shadow][/center]

item.title: My 3 (or more) Problems

i know, but what case number does what?

thanks =)

item.title: My 3 (or more) Problems
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

question 1 What are cases, and where and how do i add them? how do they work?

Cases are basically for using Item On Item, or just like clicking on an object to make it do something. Just search for “case” in client, and you’ll see where they are added.

Read full topic

tyvm ill try it now[br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 02:43:43 PM[/size][hr]only 1 of my cases worked :([br][size=1]Posted on: April 26, 2007, 03:46:19 PM[/size][hr]i got 1 thing

item.title: My 3 (or more) Problems
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

Well, I can explain BASIC cases to you.
Teleporting Case:

case 4499: sendMessage("You crawl through the cave"); teleportToX = 2772; teleportToY = 10231; } break;

It works like this:

case (OBJECT ID #): sendMessage("(MESSAGE)"); teleportToX = (X COORDS) teleportToY = (Y COORDS); } break;

Basically, object 4499 will teleport you to 2722,10231 when you CLICK on the object.
The same is for training cases although it would look like this:

case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the dummy like a pussy..."); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((10000*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((10000*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((10000*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12; } break;
Now if heres how it works:

case $$OBJECT ID HERE$$: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the dummy like a pussy...$$MSG$$"); setAnimation($$ANIMATION NUMBER HERE$$); addSkillXP(($$EXP AMOUNT$$*playerLevel[$$SKILL #$$]), 1$$SKILL #$$); actionTimer = 12; } break;

Read full topic
